data.persona: Our little band of "treasure seekers" has heard that the men will be gone from the little village nearby. There will only be a few guards left, so we should be able to rob them with impunity. Sometimes some of us have pangs of guilt, but it doesn't last long when there's silver in our hands.
data.description:
You are in the swamp.
The swamp is glowing with wonder and color.  There are parts that range from dark red to bright yellow.  People often visit here to speak with the gods and claim it can be both harmful to those it dislikes and healing to those who it deems worthy.
There's a swamp flower and a pit of quicksand here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a staves, a knife, and a sword of the guards.
data.goal: put swamp in pit of quicksand

data.short_motivation: I need to put swamp earth in the quicksand to summon a vision of the gods.
data.mid_motivation: The gods will guide our "treasure seekers" in our upcoming raid on the village.
data.long_motivation: I want to grow wealthy and seek the blessing of the gods to make sure I succeed now and in the future.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put sword of the guards on quicksand
